nodes.bodyText: This constructor may not be available in AS 4.0. Have you done plugin make?
No; I can run that. Shouldn't that be run on the bots as well though - green bots should tell is this works across the range of supported IDEs?

green bots should tell is this works across the range of supported IDEs?

That's a good point. It should, but it isn't working. There are compilation errors in your 4.0 build.
The plugin buildPlugin command returns success even when the compilation fails. That needs to be fixed.
Ah, ok. Sorry I've been committing breaking changes - I'll vet that things work locally (and roll back things that don't).
Not your fault! And you could just add a Subst() in edit.dart instead of rolling back. Or go ahead and commit; I can fix it up.
I reverted the two api changes in there that depend on newer platform versions (and added todos indicating what versions they require).
